item.title: Report E-2023090795
item.description:
Report E-2023090795

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-02T15:12:59+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-30
  • City: GLENPOOL
  • State: OK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the load had shifted during transit due to improper blocking and bracing and that 4 of the metal 5 gallon cans of paint (un1263) had been crushed by the other freight and had released 20 gallons of product. The warehouse crew was able to contain and cleanup the release, so no contractors were dispatched.

item.title: Report X-2023090299
item.description:
Report X-2023090299

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-28T15:12:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-30
  • City: EDMOND
  • State: OK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PKG ARRIVED AT NOKC 732 FROM FTWO 760 TRAILER 838896. PKG WAS FOUND DAMAGED AND WET INSIDE TRAILER WITH INTERNAL LEAKAGE DUE TO LOOSE CAPS AND INSUFFICIENT PACKAGING. UNDECLARED HAZMAT DescribePack: LOOSE CAPS DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PKG AND CONTENTS WERE PLACED IN HAZ BAG AND HAZ TOTE

item.title: Report X-2023090298
item.description:
Report X-2023090298

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-28T15:12:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-30
  • City: EDMOND
  • State: OK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PKG ARRIVED @ NOKC 732 FROM FTSM 729 TRAILER 807897. PKG CAME OFF TRAILER WET AND DAMAGED WITH INTERNAL LEAKAGE DUE TO LOOSE CAPS AND INSUFFICIENT PACKAGING. PACKAGE WAS REFUSED BY RECIPIENT BECAUSE THE PKG WAS DAMAGED. STATION 729 FTSM DID NOT FOLLOW THE PROPER DAMAGE PKG PROCESS AND ONLY DID A RETURN TO SHIPPER. THIS IS AN UNDECLARED HAZMAT. DescribePack: LOOSE CAPS DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PKG AND CONTENTS WERE PLACED IN HAZ BAG AND HAZ TOTE
